name: CATalog-Organization WP-Plugin
author: Philipp Alber

sections.description:
CATalog is a wordpress plugin to catalog and manage your specific items.
You can easily create a table with your own content.
For every CATalog item you can set a Picture , data in the table and a custom description.

Donations

If you want to support me you can donate over paypal.me/kohleanphilipp – THANKS
sections.installation: Just download the .zip file and upload it over the admin panel
sections.faq: For specific question just send me a mail to alber.philipp@gmail.com with your problem as subject
